name: Happy Life (mwn02)
description:
Happy Life

You control a happy little stickman who's really happy about life.

So happy that he's always going toward his destiny. Never going back...

This game was made in 1 week.

Move with the D or Right arrow and jump with Space or W or Up arrow.

Tip: when you shoot, the further the mouse is from you, the faster your bullets will go.

This might be a rage game.
